thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Renesola Reports Qtrly Revenue From Continuing Operations $64.8 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Renesola Reports Qtrly Revenue From Continuing Operations $64.8 Million
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - ReneSola Ltd:
* RENESOLA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $130 MILLION TO $140 MILLION * QTRLY REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $64.8 MILLION WAS UP 61.2%
* DURING Q1 OF 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS TO CONNECT 5 MW TO 10 MW OF DG PROJECTS IN CHINA
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.00
* FOR Q1 OF 2018, COMPANYâ€™S PROJECT BUSINESS IS EXPECTED TO GENERATE REVENUE IN RANGE OF $30 TO $35 MILLION
* DURING Q1, EXPECTS TO CONNECT 5 MW TO 10 MW OF DG PROJECTS IN CHINA, AND TO MONETIZE 5 MW PROJECTS IN INTERNATIONAL MARKETS
* IN 2018, INTENDS TO CONNECT 150 MW TO 200 MW OF DG PROJECTS IN CHINA, AND TO MONETIZE 50 MW TO 70 MW PROJECTS IN INTERNATIONAL MARKETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
